original_text: But there were some people who were not clean. That was because they had touched a dead body. So they could not eat the Passover on that day. So they came to Moses and Aaron on that day.
korean_text: 그 때에 사람의 시체로 말미암아 부정하게 되어서 유월절을 지킬 수 없는 사람들이 있었는데 그들이 그 날에 모세와 아론 앞에 이르러

sentences.original_text: That was because they had touched a dead body
So they could not eat the Passover
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 유월절을 먹을 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: So they came to Moses and Aaron
